scripts.uglify:dist: uglifyjs build/src/MidiReader.js build/src/BarGrid.js build/src/App.js build/src/Interfaces.js build/src/references.js -b > build/src/index.js
scripts.uglify:test: uglifyjs  build/src/references.js build/src/Interfaces.js build/src/MidiReader.js build/src/BarGrid.js build/src/App.js build/test/spec/CxSheetSpec.js -b > ./test/spec/test_spec.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:tsc && npm run uglify:dist && npm run uglify:test
